articles.description: Though his international future is uncertain, allrounder wants "to win another World Cup - or two more - for West Indies"
articles.content: NewsThough his international future is uncertain, allrounder wants "to win another World Cup - or two more - for West Indies"

articles.author: Shashank Kishore
articles.title: Shikhar Dhawan embraces spirituality to 'try and be positive always' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "As cricketers, we are all living our dream and if you don't live happily despite that, what's the point?"
articles.content: News"As cricketers, we are all living our dream and if you don't live happily despite that, what's the point?"

articles.author: TheSportsGrail, Marukho Pfozhe
articles.title: CSA T20 League 2023 Teams List, Owners Name List, Squad Players List - The SportsGrail
articles.description: The CSA T20 League is all set for its inaugural edition in January of 2023, know the squad, teams list and owners name.
articles.content: The IPL is rapidly expanding its presence globally after its franchise owners bought all six teams in South Africa’s new T20 league the CSA T20 League, know the 2023 teams name, squad and owners list… [+6114 chars]
